name: The Tempest (ThePieFace)
description:
The Tempest is a bullet storm game where you play as a druid who oversees the temple of 5 elements. During your watch the forces of nature fall out of balance and create a tempest storm in the middle of the temple. It's up to you to bring the balance back and calm the storm with your exceptional focus.

Hold the space bar to focus and slow down time to avoid getting hit by the forces of nature.

Go to each altar, imbue your staff with the element, and use it to diffuse it's counter element.

This game was made for the GDEX 2021 Game Jam and was built within a 5 day period.
